messages.subject: Sengoku Clan Genealogy Quiz

messages.messageBody:
I know this was posted to the Samurai History Forum, but I dont
recall if it was posted here, so I will post the link, which yahoo is
guaranteed to butcher, so it will likely take some cutting and
pasting to get it right:

http://www01.quizyourfriends.com/scoreboard.php?quizname=040207035941-
